footnote: </br><hr style="border-top:1px solid #0778be"/>1 Now read the Code of Criminal Procedure, 1973 (2 of 1974).</br><hr style="border-top:1px solid #0778be"/>
content: In the absence of any provision to the contrary in this Act, the provisions of 1the Code of Criminal Procedure 1898 (V of 1898), with respect to cognizable offences shall apply to offences under this Act],
